actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Veterans.

official_title: A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to permit the Secretary to guarantee the timely payment of principal and interest on certificates evidencing an interest in a pool of mortgage loans made in connection with the sale of properties acquired under chapter 37.
short_title: Veterans' Loan Asset Sale Act of 1991

summary.text: Veterans' Loan Asset Sale Act of 1991 - Authorizes the Secretary of Veterans Affairs to guarantee the timely payment of principal and interest on certificates evidencing an interest in a pool of mortgages made in connection with the sale of properties acquired by the Department of Veterans Affairs under the Department's housing loan guaranty program.

titles.title: Veterans' Loan Asset Sale Act of 1991

A bill to amend title 38, United States Code, to permit the Secretary to guarantee the timely payment of principal and interest on certificates evidencing an interest in a pool of mortgage loans made in connection with the sale of properties acquired under chapter 37.
